categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Jaxun was a young male Human Sith Acolyte. During the Cold War, Jaxun was sent to Korriban to learn the ways of the Sith. He stood with Argog, Seferiss, and Xalek where they would prepare themselves for their dangerous trials. He was introduced to Lord Kallig by Overseer Harkun, alongside other Acolytes, but was favored by Harkun due to his species. He died on his first trial, ultimately failing to become the apprentice of the future Dark Council member, Darth Nox.
